channel.title: Harikatha on Prabhat
channel.description: Recent content in Harikatha on Prabhat

item.title: Harikatha
item.description: Harikatha About Karnataka’s Haridaasa’s cult arouses varied questions in one’s mind. The literary works of great saint poets of Karnataka answer questions relating to spiritual experiences, knowledge of Tantra, Vedic wisdom, Societal Culture, Music, Dance, theatre and the like.
